title: EPIC-008: Database Migration Strategy - Online Migrations

epic.title: Deployment & Release Management
epic.goal: Define deployment workflow, rollback strategy, zero-downtime deployment, release checklist, runbooks for production operations

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: Migration workflow: add new column -> deploy code using new column -> backfill old data -> deploy code removing old column -> drop old column
Alembic migrations tested in staging before prod
Backward-compatible migrations: old code can run on new schema during rollout
Document migration steps in release notes
Rollback plan: revert migration with Alembic downgrade (test in staging)
description: Define migration strategy for zero-downtime deployments: additive changes first, backfill data, remove old columns in follow-up release.
